about_the_game:
Step into the cosmic paws of a celestial space cat in Little Galaxia, a mesmerizing puzzle game that will transport you to the far reaches of the universe. Inspired by beloved titles such as Suika Game, Fruit Mountain, and Tetris Effect, Little Galaxia combines the thrill of planet merging with strategic destruction, offering an experience that is both relaxing and challenging.

Gameplay

In Little Galaxia, you are tasked with restoring balance to the galaxy by spawning and merging planets. Your adorable yet powerful cosmic cat harnesses the energy of the universe to create new planets. Merge these celestial bodies to form larger, more magnificent worlds, and keep the galaxy in harmony.

But balance isn’t just about creation. Sometimes, to maintain cosmic order, you must wield the power of destruction. Burn planets to clear space, making way for new ones. Strategically decide when to create and when to destroy, as each action influences the ever-evolving galactic landscape.

Features

  • Engaging Puzzle Mechanics: Merge and destroy planets to achieve balance in the galaxy.
  • Cosmic Cat Avatar: Control an enchanting space cat with unique abilities.
  • Stunning Visuals: Experience breathtaking cosmic environments and vibrant planetary animations.
  • Challenging Levels: Navigate through various levels, each offering new challenges and requiring different strategies.
  • Relaxing Soundtrack: Enjoy a soothing, ambient soundtrack that enhances your cosmic journey.

Why You’ll Love It

Little Galaxia is perfect for fans of puzzle games who enjoy a blend of strategy and creativity. Whether you’re aiming to beat high scores or simply unwind with a relaxing game, Little Galaxia provides endless entertainment. Its charming protagonist and captivating gameplay will keep you returning to the stars, eager to bring harmony to the universe.

Join the Community

Stay connected with fellow cosmic adventurers! Share your high scores, strategies, and fan art on our official community forums and social media channels.

Are you ready to balance the cosmos and become the ultimate celestial cat? Embark on your galactic adventure in Little Galaxia today!

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750 Ti equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
